TopicTitle: LTL FTP - Just wanted to say hi!

Articles.Content:
Hey all!

I just wanted to say hello and introduce myself. I've been playing since .17 and spent most of my time on breaks at my old job playing the .13 demo.

I've been lurking here for a while just reading and checking out the awesome mods and seeing much more creative folks launch awesome missions.

I'm usually on the r/KerbalSpaceProgram subreddit and can be found on there as aiiye (also on twitter)

Anyway thanks for reading...go Jeb!
